page.title: 10Taking Part in a Play
page.content: James and the Giant Peach is a thrilling fantasy story written by Roald Dahl.Youth Theatre Yorkshire are presenting the musical at the Theatre Royal in York and I am taking part.To take part we all had to audition at the Theatre Royal itself.Two weeks after the audition we all received a letter.Some people didn't get through to the show,only seventy children were picked.We go to rehearsals twice a week.We have a director,a producer and a choreographer who spend a lot of time with us.They are all very kind and patient.The show starts on the 29th June.It involves a lot of work and patience.It has been mentioned a lot in the newspapers and tickets sell fast.There are lots of costumes and we have special shoes.
